Item ID12455

The Black wizard hat (t) is a black wizard hat with a white trim, and is part of the black trimmed wizard robes. It is obtainable by completing easy Treasure Trails.

This hat is usually worn by pures as it requires no defence level and gives minimal magic defence. This item has the same bonuses as the regular black or blue Wizard hat but is worn by players to show a form of wealth.

[[File:Black wizard hat (t) chathead.png|left]]
The '''Black wizard hat (t)''' is a black [[wizard hat]] with a white trim, and is part of the [[black trimmed wizard robes]]. It is obtainable by completing [[Clue scroll (easy)|easy]] [[Treasure Trails]].

This hat is usually worn by pures as it requires no defence level and gives minimal magic defence. This item has the same bonuses as the regular black or blue [[Wizard hat]] but is worn by players to show a form of wealth.
